resources.string: Learn how to create onBoarding Screens

OnBoarding screens are loaded first time when the user Downloads your app with basic instructions on how your application works. Though not crucial they can make your app stand out. The sliding to left and rightis made possible using a view_pager view
First start by creating the fragments you want to display in the onBoarding. The main activity fragment should contain a view_pager view. Create an adapter that we will use to loead the screens
Using your adapter, connect your screens (fragments) to your main activity and customize it however you want, you can even add sliders :)
